detailed_explanation: Only in test environement. Event which is created in Gluey's test environment each time a label is printed in order to test webhook connectivity for tracking.
The carrier has sent a tracking event acknowledging that the shipment / parcel has been successfully created in their system.
A shipping label has been created by the parcel carrier.
A pin code for a parcel locker has been created indicating where a customer can drop off / collect their parcel.
A qr code has been generated that the customer can use for a paperless return.
The customer have been notified that the shipment / parcel have been created and is on its way.
The shipment / parcel / label have been cancelled
The 3PL have completed the pick and pack in the warehouse
The 3PL have sent despatch advice to a carrier

A pickup has been requested with the carrier and we are awaiting their confirmation to accept the requested date and time. Alternatively should a specific date and time not have been requested then we are awaiting for the date and time to be communicated by the carrier.
The shipment / parcel is scheduled by the carrier to be picked up on a specific date and time.
The shipment / parcel is scheduled by the carrier to be picked up - but they have not given a specific date and time (e.g. they might have given a date range / day range like Mon-Wed).
The carrier have sent a tracking event indicating a collection attempt was made for the shipment / parcel.
The collection has been cancelled
The collection date has been changed
The carrier have dispatched a vehicle to collect the shipment / parcel.
The dispatched vehicle is enroute to the pickup location.
The shipment / parcel has been collected but without sufficient detail to determine what sub_event category it fits.
The shipment / parcel has been collected from the sender, e.g. from the retailer or 3PLs warehouse.
The carrier have sent a tracking event indicating the shipment / parcel is in transit but without sufficient detail to determine what event category or sub_event category it fits.
The carrier have sent a tracking event indicating the parcel have arrived at one of the carriers facilities but without sufficient detail to determine what sub_event category it fits.

The shipment / parcel has arrived at one of the carriers sortation hubs / regional distribution centres. This is typically a larger sortation centre where parcels gets sorted to be hauled to a smaller local depot before the final mile.
The shipment / parcel has arrived at a cross-docking hub to be reloaded onto a new vehicle.
The shipment / parcel has arrived at a smaller local depot. This is typically a facility without sortation where goods gets loaded onto smaller vehicles for final mile delivery.
The carrier have sent a tracking event indicating the parcel have been processed at one of the carriers facilities but without sufficient detail to determine what sub_event category it fits.
The shipment / parcel have been processed at the facility
The shipment / parcel have been processed at the facility
The shipment / parcel have been processed at the facility
The carrier have sent a tracking event indicating the shipment / parcel have departed one of the carriers facilities but without sufficient detail to determine what sub_event category it fits.
The shipment / parcel have departed from the sortation facility
The shipment / parcel have departed from the cross-docking hub
The shipment / parcel is enroute to an airport for a domestic flight.
The shipment / parcel have taken off on a domestic flight.
The shipment / parcel have landed on a domestic airport.
The shipment / parcel is out for delivery.
The carrier have notified the customer about the delivery.
The carrier have emailed the customer with details about the delivery.
The carrier have texted the customer with details about the delivery.
The carrier have called the customer with details about the delivery.
The carrier have sent a letter to the customer with details about the delivery.
The delivery address has been changed by the customer
The delivery date has been changed by the customer
The delivery service has been changed by the customer (e.g. from standard to express)
The carrier have sent a tracking event indicating a delivery attempt was made for the shipment / parcel but with out sufficient detail to determine what sub_event category it fits.
The delivery attempt was made, and a notice was left for the recipient to arrange re-delivery or pickup.
The delivery attempt was made, but access to the address was restricted (e.g., gated community, locked building).
The delivery was attempted but receiver no longer lives at the address
The delivery was attempted but the recipient refused to take the parcel.
The delivery attempt was made, but there was no answer at the address (e.g. called receiver / used buzzer but nobody answered).
Delivery attempted but there was no safe location to leave the parcel.
Delivery failed because the address was wrong.
Delivery failed because of security issues.
The delivery attempt was made, but the warehouse was closed.
The delivery attempt was made, but access to the warehouse was denied.
The delivery attempt was made, but no receiving staff was available at the warehouse.
The delivery attempt was made, but the address was incorrect.
The delivery attempt was made outside the warehouse's receiving hours.
The delivery attempt was made, but only a partial delivery could be made due to space or capacity issues.
The delivery attempt was made, and a notice was left for the warehouse to arrange re-delivery or pickup.
The delivery attempt was made, but the necessary paperwork was incomplete.
The delivery attempt was made, but the delivery failed due to security check issues at the warehouse.
The delivery attempt was made, but the warehouse was full and unable to receive more shipments.
The delivery attempt was made, but the contact person at the warehouse was unresponsive.
The carrier have sent a tracking event indicating the shipment / parcel have been delivered but without sufficient detail to determine what sub_event category it fits.
The shipment / parcel has been delivered to a local carrier depot where the receiver can collect it from.
The shipment / parcel has been delivered and signed for.
The shipment / parcel has been left with a neighbor.
The shipment / parcel has been left in a safe place like your porch.
The shipment / parcel has been placed in a parcel locker ready for pickup.
The shipment / parcel have been delivered to a pickup / dropoff location.
The shipment / parcel have been delivered to a local post office.
The shipment / parcel have been collected by the receiver from its final delivery point (e.g. the receiver have collected the parcel from a locker, pudo location or similar).
The receiver have given a NPS (Net Promoter Score) to rate their delivery experience
The receiver have given a rating of their delivery experience.
The parcel could not be delivered and the RTS (Return-to-sender) process have been initiated.
Due to a damaged label the parcel could not be delivered and the RTS process have been initiated.
The carrier attempted to delivery the parcel but failed and the RTS process have been initiated.
The parcel was not collected by the recipient from the PUDO points or parcel locker and the RTS process have been initiated.
The parcel is being held at the local depot awaiting further instructions.
The parcel is being prepared to be returned to the sender.
The parcel is in transit back to the sender.
The parcel is undergoing customs clearance procedures.
The parcel has arrived at the carrier's return depot.
The parcel has been successfully returned to the sender.
A general administrative update from the carrier.
